word_mean: 〔复 crania〕〔NA〕颅：头部骨骼，指下颌骨以外的全部头骨
即构成颅顶，包容脑的8块头骨。另见bone项下的 cranial bones

sentence.Network_en: I'll just store your data in my cranium until we can solve this stupid mystery.
sentence.Network_cn: 我只是想把你的数据储存在我脑里直到解决了这件神秘的事情为止.

sentence.Network_en: Craniofacial: Of or involving both the cranium and the face.
sentence.Network_cn: 颅面的: 属于颅骨和脸面的或与颅骨和脸面有关的.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study absorbed mechanism of free bone auto - graft in cranium.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨颅顶部自体骨游离移植被吸收的内在机制.

...构成消化和呼吸系统的起始部。 以眶上缘、外耳门上缘和枕外隆凸联机为界将颅分为上部的脑颅和下部的面颅。一．脑颅（cerebral cranium） 由8块骨组成，包括成对的颞骨和顶骨，不成对的额骨、筛骨、蝶骨和枕骨。它们围成颅腔。颅腔的顶是穹窿形.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via medieval Latin from Greek kranion 'skull'

entry.def: Your cranium is the round part of your skull that contains your brain.

means.word_mean: 1. the part of the skull that encloses the brain
